item.description:
Learn the Basics of the Myers-Briggs, which type you are, and how to communicate well to all 16 types. The Myers-Briggs is a must to understand people and it covers many bases the Enneagram doesn't touch. It's also the most widely known personality system in the world.

Herb Pearce, M.Ed Counseling, is an expert in the Enneagram and Myers-Briggs personality systems. He uses both tools in his therapy and personal life coaching practice and teaching these systems for groups, organizations, churches, schools and companies for team and staff development.

www.herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager, Wollaston and West St.
item.name: Myers-Briggs
